data.text:
@jambotree #MPPayRise this reminds me of the famous phrase “good day to bury bad news”. The optics are terrible!
@Peston @RoryStewartUK
@jambotree Plus if you were on furlough you lost the difference between your normal pay and the 80%, never made up.
@jambotree “A parasite is an organism that lives on or in a host organism and gets its food from or at the expense of its host.” - ‘Host’ being taxpayers, ‘Food’ being money.
And, they have shafted us with benefit cuts, tax and price hikes yet they get the wage increase? Along with a hike in expenses that we have to pay for? Im in the wrong job ffs!
@jambotree I'm sure it's a tough gig being a public servant but read the room...
